dict.string: # Replaces current misspelled word with its best alternative. # You MUST have installed aspell for this to work. # # require_cmd aspell res=$(aspell <<<"$TM_CURRENT_WORD" -a --mode=none|tail -n2|cut -f2 -d:|tr -d ,) if [[ "${res:0:1}" == "*" ]] then # Correct word. Exit exit_discard fi res="${res# }" echo -n "${res%% *}"
